name: BENKOUIDER Messaoud
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Benkouider Messaoud, a flutter developer, desktop developer, network engineer and ui designer.
aboueMeDetails:
I am young graduate of ZIANE ACHOUR University, Djelfa.
I have two diplomas in this university:
First Diploma Bachelor of computer science 2015-2018
   Project: Educational management system for IT science department.
Last diploma Master degree in Networks & distributed systems 2018-2020
   Thesis: Study and implementation of an SDN solution (VLANs management application).
And i have experience in mobile application development, where I have developed applications for several clients as Freelancer.
As for desktop applications, I also have many applications in this field.
And for network management, I have practical experience
   - Three months intern at Caisse Nationale Assurances Sociales of Djelfa.
   - One years experience Network engineer at Ecole Superior Transmission of Kolea Algeria.
And this domain i was able to focus on Implementing system management and control strategies in all network facilities, and the configurations using in the router and don the switches and in the firewall.
